experience.title: Embedded Software Engineer Intern - Sierra Wireless
description: Developed embedded software for a SD card reader for device bootup through tailored Linux startup scripts, automating firmware execution for seamless functionality
Performed system integration by enabling critical Linux kernel modules and GPIOs during bootup
Tested SD reader functionality and documented results thoroughly
Detected and resolved a hardware design flaw by keenly observing unexpected SD card reader behavior, leading to proactive hardware revision for future iterations

Designed UI/UX for an online real-time virtual assistant accessed by video call using HTML, JS, CSS
Delivered and demonstrated a working system during internal and customer presentations
Profiled a live speech recognition solution through automated Python scripts for accuracy and performance

experience.title: Instructional Assistant

projects.title: Traceroute Visualizer - Personal Project
description: Created a web app to visualize the path an IP packet takes from source to destination on a 3D globe.
Implemented custom shader effects on the 3D globe to emulate an atmosphere
Used web sockets to send the traceroute IP hops from the server to the client for rendering

projects.title: Automatic Plant Caretaker - Embedded Group Project
description: Developed software to control an LED display in an automatic plant caretaker system using PRU programming on a Beaglebone Green to ensure precise timing for data transmission.

Calibrated temperature sensors and contributed to the development of a Node.js web app, enabling remote control and monitoring of plant care metrics, including soil moisture, ambient temperature, and light levels.

projects.title: Automatic Aquarium Caretaker - Personal Embedded Project
description: Developed software on a Raspberry Pi to automatically feed my fish by rotating a servo, measure the temperature of the water, and capture a live video feed of the tank.
Hosted a Node.js web app on the Pi to allow me to feed the fish remotely, view a graph of the temperature over time, and watch the live camera feed

projects.title: Automated Price Comparisons Tool - Group Project for Coast Appliances

Stored the retrieved data in a PostgreSQL database for post processing and comparison
Designed a user friendly UI in tabular format to efficiently compare prices across multiple retailers
Worked closely with a member from Coast Appliances to ensure the product met the requirements

projects.title: LED Word Clock - Personal Embedded Project
description: Designed a display panel which strategically illuminates letters in a grid with individually addressable LEDs to spell the current time in five minute intervals (e.g. “It is five to ten o’clock”)
Integrated functionality to convert UTC time to five minute intervals to display the correct words
